sections.heading: automated system, defined.Certified automated system means software certified under the streamlined sales and use tax agreement to calculate the tax imposed by each jurisdiction on a transaction, determine the amount of tax to remit to the appropriate member state, and maintain a record of the trans
sections.text: automated system, defined.Certified automated system means software certified under the streamlined sales and use tax agreement to calculate the tax imposed by each jurisdiction on a transaction, determine the amount of tax to remit to the appropriate member state, and maintain a record of the transaction.SourceLaws 2003, LB 282, ยง 12.
